a. <NA>: Strictly meant for good masks
b. <SAMPLE>: Strictly meant for sample masks
c. <REPELL>: Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for repell service only (i.e. demount existing pellicle from mask and remount a new pellicle onto mask).
d. <RECERT> Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for inspection only. No repell, no additional non-standard operations (e.g. special CD measurements, special aims check).
e. <REWORK>: Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for repell and also require additional non-standard operations (e.g. special CD measurements, special aims check).
f.  <CLEAN>: Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for  a pure clean service. (This can happen for masks w/o pellicle, or as a back side clean service of mask with pellicle) 
g. <AIMS>: Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for through-pell AIMS measurement only. No repell, no additional non-standard operations (e.g. special CD measurements, special repair).
h. <REPAIR>: Strictly meant for masks returned to maskshop for repell and repair only. No additional non-standard operations (e.g. special CD measurements, special inspection).
i.  <METROLOGY>: Strictly meant for DOMA CofC for Fab 1 (only aplicable to Toppan Dresden & AMTC).

To input the repell type provided in Repell Service Request Form
a. <NA>: production masks or repell type is not provided in Repell Service Request Form
b. <Preventative>
c. <Degradation>
d. <Damage>
e. <Contamination>
f. <SpecialService>

Only applicable when there is internal remount. Default = SHIP
Only applicable when there is internal remount. Input number of remounts performed.
If remount count = 0, input NA. If remount count ≠ 0, input pellicle part number of pellicle used.
Only applicable when there is internal remount. Date of remount. Input <NA> if remount count = 0
If remount count = 0, input final clean process (ie. SO4/SO4 Free). If remount count ≥1, input cleaning process used

Only applicable when there is cleaning. Input number of cleaning performed in the latest service only. (value should be at least 1 because for every service, even new masks will undergo cleaning) For example: For normal case, if process clean count = 1 and If remount 1 time, clean count = 2.
